peebee

A python package merging Galactic dynamics with direct acceleration measurements

Quick search

pbdot_gr¶

peebee.convenience.pbdot_gr(pb, mp, mc, e)¶

Compute , the change in orbital period due to emission of gravitational waves. Adapted from Weisberg & Huang (2016).

Pb:

Orbital period (s)

Mp:

Mass of the pulsar (M)

Mc:

Mass of the companion (M)

E:

Orbital eccentricity
